item.title: Giorgio Armani, Fashion Entrepreneur and Innovator, Has Died at 91
item.description: The founder led a business that generated around $2.7 billion in revenue annually.

item.title: Thinking of Applying to Inc.’s Best in Business Awards? Consider This
item.description: The deadline is fast approaching, and you don’t want to miss it. Here’s why.

item.title: This Broadway Executive Proves It’s Possible to Monetize Creative Passion
item.description: By prioritizing relationships and lifting others as you go, it is possible to build a business that balances creativity and financial success.

item.title: What Founders Need to Know About Their Credit, From a Leader at Experian
item.description: It can be risky to fund your startup or business with personal credit, warns an Experian executive. Here’s why.

item.title: Psychology Says ‘Skillcactions’ Are the Most Refreshing Vacations
item.description: I just got back from a beach vacation and still feel beat. Psychologists suggest I should have tried a skillcation instead.
